mapper.sql: KYID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, USERTYPE, LEVEL, USERDEPT, RENAME, DEPTNUM, TEL, ADDR, NUITNUM, KJOB
mapper.select: select KYNAME as username,KYPWD as password,KYID from K_KYUSER where KYNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select r.R_CODE as rCode from K_KYUSER u join KYROLE_USER ru on u.KYID = ru.R_ID join K_KYROLE r on ru.R_ID = r.R_ID where u.KYID = #{kyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select m.M_URL as mUrl from K_KYUSER u join KYROLE_USER ru on u.KYID = ru.R_ID join K_KYROLE r on ru.R_ID = r.R_ID join KYMENU_ROLE mr on r.R_ID = mr.R_ID join K_KYMENU m on mr.M_ID = m.M_ID where u.KYID = #{kyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
insert into K_KYUSER
KYID,
KYNAME,
KYPWD,
USERTYPE,
LEVEL,
USERDEPT,
RENAME,
DEPTNUM,
TEL,
ADDR,
NUITNUM,
KJOB,
#{kyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{kyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{kypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{usertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deptnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{nuitnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{kjob,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update K_KYUSER
KYNAME = #{kyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KYPWD = #{kypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERTYPE = #{usertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERDEPT = #{userdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RENAME = #{rename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPTNUM = #{deptnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUITNUM = #{nuitnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KJOB = #{kjob,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where KYID = #{kyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update K_KYUSER set KYNAME = #{kyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KYPWD = #{kypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERTYPE = #{usertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERDEPT = #{userdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RENAME = #{rename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPTNUM = #{deptnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUITNUM = #{nuitnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KJOB = #{kjob,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where KYID = #{kyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
